text: Tau Lewis Born October 31, 1993 Website https://taulewis.com/tau-lewis Tau Lewis (born 1993 in Toronto, Canada) is a Jamaican-Canadian artist who makes hand-sewn pieces among other things. == Artistic practice == Lewis works with materials found in nature, on the ground. Much of her work focuses on the troubles of the African community. She recycles because it has roots in her ancestry. Her earlier work used materials that were found from junkyards, now she uses fabric. == References == Category:Living people Category:1993 births
title: Tau Lewis
